error.message: Usage of deprecated trait Drupal\simpletest\ContentTypeCreationTrait in class Drupal\Tests\entity_graph_usage\Functional\EntityGraphUsageTest. Deprecated in drupal:8.4.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Tests\node\Traits\ContentTypeCreationTrait instead.

Usage of deprecated trait Drupal\field\Tests\EntityReference\EntityReferenceTestTrait in class Drupal\Tests\entity_graph_usage\Functional\EntityGraphUsageTest. Deprecated in drupal:8.6.2 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use Drupal\Tests\field\Traits\EntityReferenceTestTrait instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to entity_graph_usage.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
